scenes.description: Cinematic introduction featuring gothic castle visuals and a red moon, accompanied by the tolling of a bell.
Narration sequence where a shadowy figure speaks about being trapped and seeking freedom.
Transformation sequence as the shadowy figure breaks free from chains and reveals her true form.
Musical performance of the song 'Love Me, Love Me, Love Me'.
scenes.song_name: Love Me, Love Me, Love Me

subtitles.original: REQUIEM FOR LOVE
subtitles.english: REQUIEM FOR LOVE

subtitles.original: Oh you, there is no one I adore more.
subtitles.english: Oh you, there is no one I adore more.

subtitles.original: You, who must have risked life and limb to be here with me forevermore.
subtitles.english: You, who must have risked life and limb to be here with me forevermore.

subtitles.original: The last words I wrote before I was cast into this endless abyss...
subtitles.english: The last words I wrote before I was cast into this endless abyss...

subtitles.original: ...by the immortals seeking to protect this world and all of its inhabitants.
subtitles.english: ...by the immortals seeking to protect this world and all of its inhabitants.

subtitles.original: Wrapped in darkness, alone, void of all emotion...
subtitles.english: Wrapped in darkness, alone, void of all emotion...

subtitles.original: ...I once more feel a presence signaling my return.
subtitles.english: ...I once more feel a presence signaling my return.

subtitles.original: Love's fervent zeal, a spark of light in this ocean.
subtitles.english: Love's fervent zeal, a spark of light in this ocean.

subtitles.original: Now there is but little left for you to do before I am free and we can be together.
subtitles.english: Now there is but little left for you to do before I am free and we can be together.

subtitles.original: And those who trapped me within these pages shall rue locking away this beauty forever.
subtitles.english: And those who trapped me within these pages shall rue locking away this beauty forever.

subtitles.original: Only your love can set me free.
subtitles.english: Only your love can set me free.

subtitles.original: Go, recite the verse before you quickly...
subtitles.english: Go, recite the verse before you quickly...

subtitles.original: ...lest before me you bend and take a knee.
subtitles.english: ...lest before me you bend and take a knee.

subtitles.original:
Love Me, Love Me, Love Me
Lyrics, Music: きくお
English Translyrics: Nerissa Ravencroft
subtitles.english:
Love Me, Love Me, Love Me
Lyrics, Music: Kikuo
English Translyrics: Nerissa Ravencroft

subtitles.original:
Ah, ah-ah, ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah-ah!
La, la-la, la-la, la-la-la-la-la!
subtitles.english:
Ah, ah-ah, ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah-ah!
La, la-la, la-la, la-la-la-la-la!

subtitles.original: Once in a far away, far away world was a collar that coiled like a snake.
subtitles.english: Once in a far away, far away world was a collar that coiled like a snake.

subtitles.original: I want someone please, I need someone please, so I listened close as it howled in ache.
subtitles.english: I want someone please, I need someone please, so I listened close as it howled in ache.

subtitles.original: Please don't be angry and please don't abandon me, don't leave me here on my own. Okay?
subtitles.english: Please don't be angry and please don't abandon me, don't leave me here on my own. Okay?

subtitles.original: It wrapped itself tightly, daily and nightly, only with praise would it loosen its hold.
subtitles.english: It wrapped itself tightly, daily and nightly, only with praise would it loosen its hold.

subtitles.original: I placed in the top of my class, there's no one left for me to surpass.
subtitles.english: I placed in the top of my class, there's no one left for me to surpass.

subtitles.original: Don't I look cute in this dress?
subtitles.english: Don't I look cute in this dress?

subtitles.original: I really really must confess, it's tightening 'round my neck!
subtitles.english: I really really must confess, it's tightening 'round my neck!

subtitles.original: Give me your love, all of your love.
subtitles.english: Give me your love, all of your love.

subtitles.original: Give me your love, all you can conjure up.
subtitles.english: Give me your love, all you can conjure up.

subtitles.original: Give me your love, all of your love,
subtitles.english: Give me your love, all of your love,

subtitles.original: till you go mad with ecstasy.
subtitles.english: till you go mad with ecstasy.

subtitles.original: All of the hurt, all of the ache,
subtitles.english: All of the hurt, all of the ache,

subtitles.original: help me escape,
subtitles.english: help me escape,

subtitles.original: take it oh take it away!
subtitles.english: take it oh take it away!

subtitles.original: Is there no end to this pain?
subtitles.english: Is there no end to this pain?

subtitles.original: Ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah!
subtitles.english: Ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah!
